TopicTitle: game crashes 30 seconds after starting up save file

Articles.Content:
please help me out when ever i start up my game it crash immediately (or about after 15 seconds) crash without displaying a error message

this hsa been going on for a few weeks now and i cant play ksp it used to be for a little while (about 2-3 minutes) it would run fine but then it would just close the game then it got better for a while and it would work for about 30 minutes and now its just to the point where it wont go 20 seconds without crashing. please help me!! i really want to play but its crashing so often is disabling that option please someone give me a answer

Please follow the instructions in the "How to get support" sticky thread in this sub-forum, especially the parts about listing your mods (with their versions) and supplying an output_log.txt/player.log file.
